reviews.review: 港真，这游戏是个竞技游戏，真的对新手很不友好，游戏性很强，但是很难，需要大量的练习和学习才能玩的好，如果是娱乐向的玩家不如去吃鸡或者玩杰森星期五。

This game is probably the only horror game I consider my "go to" when playing with friends. I personally am not to big on the horror genre, but this game is alright. It keeps me on edge whenever I enter a match.

This game offers the chance of playing as both a survivor and a killer. There are many survivors to choose from, in which you can level up and dedicate what this game calls "bloodpoints" into their skill trees to get new perks and items to use in-game. The same can be said with the killers, there are good amount of killers to choose from and you can basically have the same freedom to customization with them as you do with survivors. Buying DLCs are a must if you want to gain access to specific survivors and/or killers. They also offer most customizable items for survivors/killers. 

The gameplay as I said is great, it keeps me on edge whenever I play despite experiencing the same thing over and over again. There are different maps to play on, and there's a custom lobby so you can solely play with 5 of your friends alone. The different perks and items you can gain access to and use in-game make it a more fun experience for both killers and survivors that make it both more challenging and difficult for both sides in-game.

Overall this a great horror/survival game that keeps you alert at all times. Lots of customization, characters, and abilities/items that help the game stay replayable with or without friends.

[b]The community as people said is pretty garbage though.[/b]
Me gusta mucho este juego, lo recomiendo mucho aquellas personas que les guste mucho tener los nervios de punta.

hasta que no pongan un competitivo o algo que separe a los buenos jugadores con los malos no dare mi positivo no puede ser que alguien con rango 1 no sepa loopear y que ande como rata por todo el mapa que tu en una persecucion duras dos o tres motores y el asesino se va con otro y lo tumba a los 30 segundos... mucho equilibrio de mapa (que esta bien) pero poco equilibrio de jugadores.

Lots of fun with mates, would definitely recommend.

Esse jogo traz muitos momentos divertidos assim como traz momentos frustrantes, porém a diversão superou toda a toxidade desse jogo, o que explica o fato de eu e muitos jogadores terem tantas horas registradas.
[list]
    [*]Killer: Você vai perceber a necessidade de ter uma estratégia de jogo a medida que você sobe de rank, o que tornam as coisas muito mais interessantes. Derrubar aquele sobrevivente chato que estava te dando trabalho da uma sensação muito satisfatória :3
    [*]Survivor: Se assustar nas primeiras partidas, se esconder [strike]no armário jogando de Dwight[/strike], correr do killer e ajudar os outros é muito mais divertido do que parece.
    [*]SWF: Você com certeza vai se divertir jogando com os amigos de sobrevivente, mesmo que você seja sacrificado, faz parte, a diversão é a mesma.
    [*]Não se deixe abalar pelos BMs e jogadores tóxicos. Toda comunidade tem um lado ruim, só respire fundo e parta para a próxima partida ([strike]EDIT: ou vai jogar Civ[/strike]).
[/list]
(Com 900 hrs e eu ainda não tinha feito a análise desse jogo lindo kkk)

之前我是给好评的，24号以后，大改，改的什么东西，板子区全是短板子，带踢板的屠夫人连转点都转不了，屠夫守尸人类不修根本玩不了，整天削人，削的什么东西，猪人有点强了懂么，不需要头套就一直干一个人就行！改的什么玩意？！双板区没了，人类玩什么？随便一个屠夫都能追着人杀，还是无脑追，只要不跟丢，这就是游戏初衷？别人怎么玩人？2.01以后 这游戏 可能凉了吧 我玩屠夫已经排不到人了 再见了 可能是服务器问题吧 等优化吧

El juego me encanta, tiene pros y contras, puede ser dificil al principio pero con amigos lo pasas genial, hay momentos frustrantes y gratificantes. 
Lo recomiendo porque con todos sus contra, que los tiene! (los campers, face campers, los team players y miles de bugs como el de que se borre tu progreso y tenes que darte a la tarea de salvar (guardar) una copia de seguridad siempre del juego XD). me la paso genial.
si lo vas a comprar yo esperaria una oferta de steam y asi comprar alguno de los dlc tmb. el juego no te va a aburrir le vas a dar horas antes de eso,

В игре немало персонажей, у каждого есть свои уникальные способности, которые могут вам помочь в процессе игры. В игре много подношений, предметов, ежедневных заданий, аддонов и т.д. Вы можете почувствовать себя либо в роли выжившего, либо же в роли маньяка. 

Я испытывала очень много эмоций, играя в эту игру, ибо, в этой игре, вы можете подружиться с кем-нибудь (в том числе и с маньяком), или быть вычисленным по «айпи» :D

К сожалению, дисбаланс в игре, может вызвать дискомфорт, ибо, возможно такое, что закинет к опытным игрокам и вам придется попотеть, но это, не столь частое явление в игре.

If you like running from killers and testing yourself against another player this is a good game for that.  There's a simple tutorial which is all text based.  It's great for the basics and then lets you learn many things on your own. Rather then being annoying it's actually a nice way to learn the game without being overwelmed right away.  Replayability is really high since nothing is the same from one game to another.  You're not forced to watch if you die right away but if you want to you can.

Working as a team isn't forced but the game is great at getting people to work together in a non annoying way.  I haven't played as a killer yet but that's because I'm enjoying being a survivor so much.  I believe playing as a killer is fun to since I have many friends that enjoy it a lot.

我觉得我欠杀机一个评测，趁着stm评奖来写一个。
我给杀机投票了“魂萦梦牵”奖，其实“爱的付出”奖也很适合杀机，但“魂萦梦牵”奖真的太太太符合我对杀机的感觉了！
5、6月份刚玩的时候真的是白天晚上甚至梦中都在想杀机！还记得那个时候，萌新的我第一次跑出去只有六千分...全局老年人散步+制作爆米花。刚开始玩的时候真的不习惯这个qte，然而现在我已经是一个顶着恶咒修五台的究极猥琐老机皇了...但是杀机对我来说依然很有新鲜感！不同的屠夫、不同的队友、不同的技能搭配、不同的道具等导致了不同的打法，这也是杀机可玩性很高的原因。
杀机确实不是完美的——它有瑕疵，有bug，有还不够平衡的地方，但它也是一直在成长的。真的很感谢制造组带给我们这么一款有新意、有诚意的作品！杀机陪伴着我们，我们也一路陪伴着杀机，见证它的成长！

Instead of burying the take away in the last paragraph, let me start by saying: GET THIS GAME if the following sounds like even a little bit of fun.  There is a learning curve but after a few games you’ll get the hang of things.  The chances of meeting friends on this game to play with is extremely high if you’re a friendly person.

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetric, horror game which pits four survivors against one killer.  The survivor's objective is to repair five of the eight generators - which spawn randomly at the beginning of each round - and make their way to the two exits - which also spawn randomly at the beginning of each round - to activate the doors and escape.  The killer's objective is ostensibly to simply kill but the process is a bit more complicated than that.  For a survivor to be taken out of the game, a killer must hit them twice to knock them down to the ground and hook them; it takes a maximum of three hooks to “kill” a survivor.

Due to the asymmetric nature of the game, the killer will be slightly faster, will have a weapon to damage survivors and use an ability specific to that killer to slay their victims.  Survivors, while they cannot use weapons themselves can take advantage of certain items, barricades/pallets and use the terrain to their advantage.  Both can use perks, add-ons (which augment an item or ability) and offerings which can dramatically alter the experience of the round for better or worse.

While there are a few bugs that can appear during gameplay, Dead by Daylight is an ever-evolving game as the developers seem genuinely interested in the game and its community.  The love and attention that they put into everything they do as well as the amount of consideration they give to the gamers who play is astounding.
As stated in the beginning, if this is a genre that you’re interested in or are simply looking for a few friends to hang out with, this game is an excellent choice.  I hope you’ll pull the trigger and get it … and if you do, I’ll see you in the fog.


~Ken Riven

A fun and rather intense game to play/stream solo. PvP game, including blood, running, chasing, and a little jumpscare... There are 2 sides: you can play either Survivor or Killer (4v1).

Survivors in this game might be a little toxic, some will taunt killers or hide and do nothing to help teammates, and killers sometimes really go sweaty or tryhard in this game for the kills, just ignore that, play for fun and there is nothing to worry about. Of course, sometimes you escape sometimes not, sometimes you get 4 kills sometimes not, you win some you lose some, there's no true definition of winning or losing in this game but there's a desire to be the dominant one of each side.

Probably not fit you well if you totally know nothing about this game, in that case, watch other streamers/youtubers play it for a while to understand the mechanic, perks, items...and then decide to buy later on, there's A LOT to learn as new contents keep coming out. (People with hundreds of hours in this game are nothing and considered inexperience)

Playerbase is consistent and tends to slowly grow over time. It usually goes on sale whenever a new content drops (every 3 months) I will say it's not a newbie-friendly game, especially for people that just want to come and go. 

In the long run, this game requires HUGE amount of blood points (BP, a vital currency) grinding to get Perks (which give you different abilities to use during a match alongside Items and Offerings) for a better chance of surviving/killing. For example, if you want to be able to go against well-equipped players, I say you need to have at least 10 million BP. 
Meanwhile, the [i]average[/i] survivor game gives you around 15k per match, the killer's about 20k/match, each match is about 12 minutes, you might get less than that if not experienced. (More bloodpoints can be obtained through Archives challenges and community Store codes)
But at the same time, there are many people out there that are new to the game too, so keep playing and learning.

The game is very difficult at the beginning but nothing can stop you from exploring and playing DBD your own way, be chill and don't push too hard on killing/surviving then this game is worth it! 
(Not recommended for people easily rage or get offended, play this game at your own risk!)

Ich Empfehle es wenn man einen Hang zur Vernichtung hat, da es mir persönlich einfach am meisten Freude bereitet die kleinen verängstigten Menschlein an den Haken zu hängen, ihnen stehts auf der Spur zu sein, und immer einen Schritt voraus denken zu müssen.
Ist man mit Freunden Unterwechs dann ganz klar der Überlebende, das stärkt den Teamgeist und Selbstlosigkeit.
Natürlich gibt es hin und wieder Probleme Bugs und Menschen mit viel zu hohem Ping Q_Q.
Aber ich würde es jederzeit empfehlen.

Dead by Daylight mag für viele schnell langweilig werden und eintönig wirken, jedoch muss man bedenken, dass jede Runde trotzdem anders ist (sofern man nicht hintereinander auf Camper trifft).
Man repariert Generatoren um das Eingangstor mit Energie zu versorgen, welches dir zur Freiheit verhilft/führt. Es gibt auch, für den gescheiterten versuch, eine Luke, die sich erst dann öffnet, wenn der letzte Überlebende auf der Map ist. 
Es ist recht interessant zu sehen, wie anders jeder Killer Tickt und Handelt. Es gibt welche die spielen fair, denken voraus und legen Fallen an den richtigen Orten. Dann gibt es wieder die unfairen, die dich Tunneln, sich nur auf einen versteifen und sich auch nicht von seinem Opfer abbringen lassen...
Dennoch macht das Spiel recht viel Spaß, besonders mit Freunden, auch SWF genannt, was irgendwie viele Killer fürchten. 
Man findet auch neue User, mit denen man zusammen mal eine Runde oder so spielt. Das Spiel basiert komplett auf Teamwork. Wer einen Einzelgänger Modus hat und diesen ausleben will, ist hier komplett falsch. 
Allen anderen kann ich das Spiel nur wärmstens empfehlen.
